column3: [' (StepDescription: add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted))']

column4: ErrorDescription:Used a wooden spoon instead of a brush)
column5: (StepDescription: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides using a wooden spoon)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate)']
[' (StepDescription: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves)']
[' (StepDescription: add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread)']
